targets.query: SELECT count(distinct("$mode")) FROM (SELECT first("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = '$mode') GROUP BY "$mode" fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(none)
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT last("$metric_a") AS "user" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'user') GROUP BY time($buckets), "user" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "user"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT last("$metric_b") AS "user" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'user') GROUP BY time($buckets), "user" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "user"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT last("$metric_a") AS "client" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'client') GROUP BY time($buckets), "client" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "client"
SELECT "$mode" FROM (SELECT last("$metric_b") AS "client" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'client') GROUP BY time($buckets), "client" fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "client"

SELECT "last" FROM (SELECT last("rw_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = '$mode') GROUP BY time($buckets), "$mode" fill(0) LIMIT 1) WHERE ("last" > 0) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "$pie_idle" FROM (SELECT $bandwidth - last("rw_rate") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_$mode') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT max("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = 'vnas01' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(null)
SELECT count(distinct("server")) FROM (SELECT first("bsy") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY "server" fill(none)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets)
SELECT last("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT last("write_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT last("read_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)
SELECT last("write_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)

SELECT "last" FROM (SELECT last("rw_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0) LIMIT 1) WHERE ("last" > 0) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "$pie_idle" FROM (SELECT $bandwidth - last("rw_rate") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(null)
SELECT last("reqs") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(0)
SELECT last("reqs") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)
SELECT last("total_rate") FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($buckets), "server" fill(null)
SELECT "$show_bsy" FROM (SELECT last("bsy") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT "$show_qlen" FROM (SELECT last("qlen") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server"
SELECT "$show_bsy" FROM (SELECT last("bsy") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "$show_qlen" FROM (SELECT last("qlen") AS "Show" FROM "tail" WHERE ("host" = '$host' AND "ident" = 'total_server') GROUP BY time($buckets) fill(0)) WHERE $timeFilter

title: BeeGFS I/O Data Rates by User/Client/Node
